timeline.bodyText: Did you intend to keep this or it just for debugging?
timeline.author: rmstar
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -304,6 +304,7 @@ function download_file() {
 
   echo "Downloading using curl ${file_name}"
   echo "from ${source_dir}"
+  echo "curl --silent ${source_dir}/${file_name} --output ${target}"

replies.bodyText:
This would be helpful. Until I added this check I couldn't figure out why the call to fetch README.rst was failing and generating an incorrect hash.
The original logic was adding extra / which made github return 301 (Permanently moved) which was causing the build to fail for some reason.
replies.author: ajainarayanan

replies.bodyText: I see, thanks for explaining. I guess we need to pass -L arg to curl to follow redirects
replies.author: rmstar
